text: Filippo Tasso (born August 26, 1940 in Milan) is a retired Italian professional football player. His only season in the Serie A was his debut, 1958/59 one, when he played 3 games and scored 2 games for A.S. Roma. He also played for Roma in the 1958–60 Inter-Cities Fairs Cup and scored 2 goals in their first round matchup against the German club Hannover 96. ==External links== *Profile at Enciclopediadelcalcio.it Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:A.S.
